greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Decimal expansion of (137283+87958*sqrt(2))/241^2.
comment: Equals lim_{n -> infinity} b(n)/b(n-1) for n mod 3 = 0, b = A129991.
Equals lim_{n -> infinity} b(n)/b(n-1) for n mod 3 = 1, b = A159565.
link: G. C. Greubel, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
xref: Cf. A129991, A159565, A002193 (decimal expansion of sqrt(2)), A159566 (decimal expansion of (243+22*sqrt(2))/241).
results.author: _Klaus Brockhaus_, Apr 16 2009
